person.persName: Henry Clay Hedges (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (11th KY Cav))

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Hedges and Lucinda Hedges. Married to Missouri Oder Hedges in Grant County, Kentucky, on September 10, 1859. Father of Lucy J. Hedges and Green T. Hedges. Resident of Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1850. Graduated from Ohio Wesleyan University in Delaware County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a sergeant from September 22, 1862 to June 2, 1865. Captured at the Battle of Philadelphia in Monroe County, Tennessee, on October 20, 1863. Prisoner of war from October 20, 1863 to March 1, 1865.
